:root { --accent: #4CAF50; } body { font-family: serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; } header { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 10px 20px; } .hero { text-align: center; padding: 50px 20px; } #about, #projects, #contact { padding: 20px; } a:focus { outline: 2px solid var(--accent); } @media (prefers-reduced-motion) { * { transition: none !important; } }
